name: Unify (itch)
description:
Unify is a experimental orbital platformer I created as a final project for Object Oriented Programming 2 and Mobile Programming.  The objective is to escape an unrealistic representation of an asteroid field by finding your ship! (A glowing blue box)

List of experiments done in this project:

Json

Firebase Authorization 

Orbital Gravity

Controls:

A, D, Right and Left Keys - Move

Space - Jump

Left click - Shoot

Right click - Throw plasma grenade
